categories: Category:Star Wars: Episode VI Return of the Jedi actors

nodes.text: Glyn Baker is a retired British actor who portrayed Imperial Lieutenant Endicott aboard the second Death Star in the 1983 film Star Wars: Episode VI Return of the Jedi. His two major career film credits include the 1978 film The Wild Geese and the 1987 James Bond film The Living Daylights, in which he played the character 002.
